artview.plugins.DirectoryList¶

class artview.plugins.DirectoryList(dirIn=None, name='DirectoryList', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Open an interactive python console so the direct manipulation.

__init__(dirIn=None, name='DirectoryList', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface.

Parameters:

[Optional] :

dirIn: string :

Initial directory path to open.

name : string

Window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to this class. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.

Methods

DirectoryList.contextMenu(pos) Contruct right-click menu.
DirectoryList.doubleClick(index) Open Directory or File on double click.
DirectoryList.guiStart([parent]) Graphical interface for starting this class.
DirectoryList.open(path) Open file.
DirectoryList.open_with(func, path) Open file using a given function.

Attributes

see Shared Variables Table

see Shared Variables Table
